mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(userName, wxOpenid, role) VALUES (#{userName}, #{wxOpenid}, #{role});
mapper.select: SELECT role FROM User WHERE userId = #{userId};
SELECT wxOpenid FROM User WHERE userId = #{userId};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM User WHERE userId = #{userId};
SELECT * FROM User WHERE userName = #{userName} AND passwd = #{passwd};

SELECT u.userId, u.userName, u.wxOpenid, u.phoneNumber, u.idCard, u.email, u.responsibleArea, u.role, u.passwd, a.auditId, a.auditTime, a.realName, ar.managerId, ar.result, ar.resultTime FROM User u LEFT JOIN Audit a ON u.userId = a.userId LEFT JOIN AuditResult ar ON ar.auditId = a.auditId WHERE u.userId = #{userId} AND u.role = 'INSPECTOR' ORDER BY a.auditId DESC LIMIT 1;
